18
19#include "ResultPoint.h"
20
21namespace ZXing {
22namespace QRCode {
23
24/**
25* <p>Encapsulates an alignment pattern, which are the smaller square patterns found in
26* all but the simplest QR Codes.</p>
27*
28* @author Sean Owen
29*/
30class AlignmentPattern : public ResultPoint
31{
32 float _estimatedModuleSize = 0;
33
34public:
35 AlignmentPattern() = default;
36 AlignmentPattern(float posX, float posY, float estimatedModuleSize);
37
38 float estimatedModuleSize() const {
39 return _estimatedModuleSize;
40 }
41
42 bool isValid() const { return _estimatedModuleSize > 0.f; }
43
44 /**
45 * <p>Determines if this alignment pattern "about equals" an alignment pattern at the stated
46 * position and size -- meaning, it is at nearly the same center with nearly the same size.</p>
47 */
48 bool aboutEquals(float moduleSize, float i, float j) const;
49
50 /**
51 * Combines this object's current estimate of a finder pattern position and module size
52 * with a new estimate. It returns a new {@code FinderPattern} containing an average of the two.
53 */
54 AlignmentPattern combineEstimate(float i, float j, float newModuleSize) const;
55};
56
57} // QRCode
58} // ZXing
59
